subject: Baseball
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Donaldson and Chris Colabello hit solo home runs, Aaron Sanchez pitched a career-high seven innings, and Toronto beat struggling Boston for the 3,000th victory in Blue Jays history.
snippet: Josh Donaldson and Chris Colabello hit solo home runs, Aaron Sanchez pitched a career-high seven innings, and Toronto beat struggling Boston for the 3,000th victory in Blue Jays history.
